text: Jacob Batalon (,As pronounced by Jacob Batalon and Tom Holland in "Tom Holland, Zendaya & Jacob Batalon Answer the Web's Most Searched Questions" (Wired, June 25, 2009) – via YouTube. born October 9, 1996) is a Filipino- American actor, best known for his role as Ned Leeds in the Marvel Cinematic Universe films Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), Avengers: Infinity War (2018), Avengers: Endgame (2019), and Spider-Man: Far From Home (2019). ==Early life and education== Batalon was born in Honolulu, Hawaii, to Filipino parents. Upon graduating from the private Catholic school St. Anthony's School, he went to Damien Memorial School, then Batalon attended Kapi'olani Community College to study music theory, but later dropped out. He then took a two-year program to study acting at the New York Conservatory for Dramatic Arts. ==Career== Batalon made his acting debut in 2016, when he made an appearance in the film North Woods. In 2017, Batalon landed his first major role in Spider-Man: Homecoming, as Peter Parker's friend Ned. He reprised the role in Avengers: Infinity War and Avengers: Endgame, and the 2019 sequel Spider-Man: Far From Home. In 2018, Batalon played one of the bodies inhabited by spirit A in young-adult film Every Day. ==Personal life== Batalon has seven half-siblings: a brother and a sister from his mother, and three brothers and two sisters from his father. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable unsortable" |- !Year !Title !Role !Notes |- |rowspan=2|2017 |North Woods |Cooper | |- |Spider-Man: Homecoming |Ned Leeds | |- |rowspan=4|2018 |Every Day |James | |- |Blood Fest |Krill | |- |Avengers: Infinity War |Ned Leeds |Cameo |- |Banana Split |Jacob | |- |rowspan=5|2019 |Avengers: Endgame |rowspan=2|Ned Leeds |Cameo |- |Spider-Man: Far From Home | |- |The True Don Quixote |Sancho Panza | |- |Let It Snow |Keon | |- |Bubble Gang |Need |2 episodes |- |rowspan=2|2020 |Day by Day |Lucas |Episode: "#AnnabelleClarkeIsOverParty" |- |50 States of Fright |Simon |Episode: "Red Rum (Colorado)" |- |2021 |Untitled Spider-Man: Far From Home sequel |Ned Leeds |Filming |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:21st-century American male actors Category:American male actors of Filipino descent Category:American male film actors Category:Male actors from Honolulu
